MCP Cognitive Processor Enhancement Recommendations:

1. Performance Optimizations:
- Implement lazy loading for services and strategies
- Add request batching in ProcessingPipelineOrchestrator
- Optimize token usage with smarter context pruning
- Implement caching for frequently used model responses

2. Architecture Improvements:
- Implement plugin architecture for service adapters
- Add service discovery mechanism
- Implement circuit breakers for external services
- Add service health monitoring and auto-recovery

3. Maintainability Enhancements:
- Improve error handling and logging
- Add comprehensive metrics collection
- Implement feature flags for gradual rollouts
- Add automated testing for core components

4. Error Handling & Monitoring:
- Add distributed tracing
- Implement better error recovery strategies
- Add performance monitoring dashboards
- Implement automated alerting system
